name: Wine.com
description: Wine. com is the USA #1 online wine retailer offering thousands of wines, wine gifts, gift baskets and monthly wine clubs.  Wine. com provides its API for third-party developers to create and enhance wine applications.

apis.name: Wine.com
apis.description: The goal of this API is to provide developers access to our extensive catalog of wine and wine related content in an open and easy to use manner.  The API is built using REST principles. You can retrieve content in either XML or JSON format. Please visit our documentation to read how the API works and the conditions of use.
